phases.label: Problem Definition
phases.shortDescription: Define goals, constraints, and success metrics.

problemPool.title: Scope Drift
problemPool.description: The team is adding features outside the original objective.
options: Freeze scope and restate objective metrics

problemPool.title: Missing Success Metric
problemPool.description: No measurable KPI has been selected.
options: Pick one or two measurable KPIs

problemPool.title: Stakeholder Misalignment
problemPool.description: Different stakeholders want contradictory outcomes.

problemPool.title: Coverage Gap
problemPool.description: Important user segments are missing in the dataset.
options: Collect targeted samples for missing segments
Drop the missing segments from scope

problemPool.title: Permission Error
problemPool.description: Access to one source is unauthorized.

problemPool.title: Schema Mismatch
problemPool.description: Two sources use different field formats.
options: Create a schema mapping before merge

problemPool.title: Missing Values Spike
problemPool.description: A key feature has many null entries.
options: Replace all nulls with zero always

problemPool.title: Outlier Explosion
problemPool.description: Extreme values dominate model inputs.
options: Investigate and cap or transform responsibly

problemPool.title: Duplicate Records
problemPool.description: Duplicate events inflate trends.
options: Keep duplicates for bigger sample size

phases.label: Feature Engineering
phases.shortDescription: Transform raw fields into useful signals.

problemPool.title: Feature Leakage
problemPool.description: A feature indirectly reveals the target.

problemPool.title: Scale Inconsistency
problemPool.description: Features use incompatible units.

problemPool.title: Sparse Explosion
problemPool.description: One-hot encoding creates too many sparse columns.
options: Encode every unique value no matter what

problemPool.title: Overfitting Alert
problemPool.description: Training score is high, validation score drops.

problemPool.title: Bad Data Split
problemPool.description: Train and test sets are not representative.
options: Reuse training data as test data

problemPool.title: Unstable Runs
problemPool.description: Model metrics vary significantly per run.
options: Fix random seeds and report variance

problemPool.title: Wrong Metric
problemPool.description: Accuracy is used for an imbalanced problem.

problemPool.title: Evaluation Leakage
problemPool.description: Validation set influenced feature design.

problemPool.title: No Baseline
problemPool.description: Model improvement cannot be quantified.

problemPool.title: Environment Drift
problemPool.description: Production package versions differ from training.

problemPool.title: Latency Spike
problemPool.description: Prediction endpoint breaches SLA.

problemPool.title: No Rollback Plan
problemPool.description: Failed release cannot be reversed quickly.

phases.label: Monitoring
phases.shortDescription: Track model quality and data drift.

problemPool.title: Data Drift
problemPool.description: Live feature distributions diverge from training.
options: Set drift alerts and retraining triggers

problemPool.title: Feedback Loop Missing
problemPool.description: No process exists for collecting model errors.

problemPool.title: Alert Fatigue
problemPool.description: Too many noisy alerts are ignored.
